title: Calories in Flour
meta_description: Discover calories in flour per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for all-purpose white flour, with tweaks and FAQs.
assumptions: All-purpose white flour, unenriched, sifted; standard pantry staple without additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (e.g., white vs. whole wheat), brand, enrichment, and processing. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of all-purpose flour provides ~364 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of flour?
faqs.a: About 364 kcal for all-purpose white flour.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in flour?
faqs.a: Roughly 76g total carbs per 100g, with 2.7g fiber.
Moderatelyâ€”10.3g protein per 100g, mainly from gluten.

faqs.q: Calories in whole wheat vs. white flour?
faqs.a: Whole wheat has ~340 kcal per 100g; white has 364 kcal.

faqs.q: Does flour have fat or cholesterol?
